ISSUE.TITLE: Clean up unused forms on pages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: For example, on the Admin / Template / List page, the form refers to a non-existent controller and action: <form asp-controller = "Templates" asp-action = "List" method = "post">. All other pages should also be reviewed.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #3619 Fixed the "measures" page. Also applied a new "panels" design to it

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3614 Removed unused "forms" element on the templates page (admin area)
